abandonPayment._description: Signal that a payment being built is abandoned and reset the form fields to their initial states.

accountsReceived._description: Update our store of account data

assetsReceived._description: Update our store of assets data

builtPaymentReceived._description: Update our store with a prepared payment

builtRequestReceived._description: Update our store with a prepared payment

clearBuilding._description: Clear a payment or request that was being prepared

clearBuiltPayment._description: Clear a prepared payment once it has been sent or canceled

clearBuiltRequest._description: Clear a prepared request once it has been sent or canceled

cancelRequest._description: Cancel a request. Optionally delete an associated message

cancelPayment._description: Cancel a payment. Valid for payments of status 'cancelable'. If showAccount is true, nav to the currently selected account when done.

createNewAccount._description: Add a new wallet to your account
createNewAccount.name: string

createdNewAccount._description: The service responded with an error or that the create new account operation succeeded

exportSecretKey._description: Export a Stellar account's secret key

loadAssets._description: Refresh our list of assets for a given account

loadMorePayments._description: Scrolled down the list of payments for a given account

loadPayments._description: Refresh our list of payments for a given account

loadPaymentDetail._description: Load extra detail for one given payment

loadDisplayCurrencies._description: Load valid display currencies to choose from

markAsRead._description: Mark the given payment ID and anything older as read.

displayCurrenciesReceived._description: Update valid display currencies to choose from

loadSendAssetChoices._description: Load valid assets for sending to user

sendAssetChoicesReceived._description: Update valid send assets to choose from

changeAccountName._description: Change the name of an account
changeAccountName.name: string

changedAccountName._description: A response from the service after an account's name is changed

didSetAccountAsDefault._description: A response from the service after an account is set as the default

deletedAccount._description: A response from the service after an account is deleted.

loadDisplayCurrency._description: Load display currency for an account

displayCurrencyReceived._description: Update display currency for a certain account

changeDisplayCurrency._description: Change display currency for an account

paymentDetailReceived._description: Update a payment with additional detail

paymentsReceived._description: Update our store of payments data

secretKeyReceived._description: Update our store with an exported secret key

secretKeySeen._description: Clear exported secret keys from our store once they've been seen

selectAccount._description: Select an account. Optionally navigate to the account page.

refreshPayments._description: In response to a notification, resync payment info

setBuildingTo._description: Set building to -- depends on recipientType

openSendRequestForm._description: Initialize and navigate to the send or request form. See docs for `setBuilding*` for param semantics.

linkExistingAccount._description: Link an existing Stellar account with this Keybase user.
linkExistingAccount.name: string

linkedExistingAccount._description: The service responded with an error or that the link existing operation succeeded

validateAccountName._description: Ask the service to validate an account name.
validateAccountName.name: string

validatedAccountName._description: The service responded with an error or that the account name is valid.
validatedAccountName.name: string

validateSecretKey._description: Ask the service to validate an account secret key.

validatedSecretKey._description: The service responded with an error or that the secret key is valid.

clearErrors._description: Clear errors from the store at times like opening or closing a form dialog.
